means: 支撑( carry的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
The operation is carried out under a general anaesthetic.
sentence.Network_cn: 该手术是在全身麻醉情况下实施的。

sentence.Network_en: He carried on telling a joke, laughing his head off.
sentence.Network_cn: 他继续讲笑话，自己笑得前仰后合。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... partly adv. 部分, 几分 carried 被携带的, 被运载的 witch n. 巫婆, 女巫, 迷人的女子.
They put the lion in a strong cage and carried it to the truck ., 他们将狮子放在了一个结实的笼子里 , 就扛着它上了卡车.
we carried our children back up to their tree ., 我们把孩子们抬回到圣诞树下.
The guerrillas armory and carried off 22 rifles ., 游击队打进武器库 , 夺走了 22 枝步枪.

list.abs: 【资源】英语常用短语 ... carry out one's promise 遵守某人的诺言 carry out 实行 carry with 进行、继续.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... care for 喜欢；照顾（病人） carry off 携走，夺走 carry on 继续下去; 继续开展.
介词短语_百度百科 ... care for 照管，关心；喜欢，意欲 carry off 夺去 carry on 继续下去；从事，经营.
动词加介词词组,._百度文库 ... insist on 坚持 carry on 继续，进行 keep／go on 继续.
介词短语_百度百科 ... carry off 夺去 carry on 继续下去；从事，经营 carry out 贯彻，执行；实现.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... carry away 运走，使失去自制力 carry forward 推进，发扬 carry into effect 实行，实现，实施.

entry.def: If you carry something, you take it with you, holding it so that it does not touch the ground.

example.ex: He was carrying a briefcase...
example.tran: 他提着公文包。

example.ex: He carried the plate through to the dining room...
example.tran: 他端着盘子来到餐厅。

entry.def: If you carry something, you have it with you wherever you go.

example.ex: You have to carry a bleeper so that they can call you in at any time.
example.tran: 你要随身带着寻呼机,以便他们随时呼你。

entry.def: If something carries a person or thing somewhere, it takes them there.

example.ex: Flowers are designed to attract insects which then carry the pollen from plant to plant...
example.tran: 花的作用在于吸引昆虫，然后昆虫再将花粉传到其他植株上。

example.ex: The delegation was carrying a message of thanks to President Mubarak...
example.tran: 代表团向穆巴拉克总统转达了谢意。

entry.def: If a person or animal is carrying a disease, they are infected with it and can pass it on to other people or animals.

example.ex: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low...
example.tran: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

example.ex: Frogs eat pests which destroy crops and carry diseases.
example.tran: 青蛙吃破坏庄稼、传播疾病的害虫。

entry.def: If an action or situation has a particular quality or consequence, you can say that it carries it.

example.ex: Check that any medication you're taking carries no risk for your developing baby...
example.tran: 仔细检查,确保你所服用的任何药物不会对胎儿造成危险。

example.ex: Individualism, and the breakdown of social harmony, had a constructive purpose. But they also carried a price.
example.tran: 个人主义以及社会和谐的崩溃具有一定的建设意义,然而这也是有代价的。

entry.tran: 使达到(目标);帮助…渡过(难关)
entry.def: If a quality or advantage carries someone into a particular position or through a difficult situation, it helps them to achieve that position or deal with that situation.

example.ex: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet...
example.tran: 他具有进入内阁所必需的冷酷性格。

example.ex: The warmth and strength of their relationship carried them through difficult times.
example.tran: 他们互相关心,关系牢固,这才熬过了艰难岁月。

entry.def: If you carry an idea or a method to a particular extent, you use or develop it to that extent.

example.ex: It's not such a new idea, but I carried it to extremes...
example.tran: 这虽然不是什么新想法，但是我将它发挥到了极致。

example.ex: We could carry that one step further by taking the same genes and putting them into another crop.
example.tran: 我们可以再进一步：取出相同的基因,并将它们植入另一植株。

entry.def: If a newspaper or poster carries a picture or a piece of writing, it contains it or displays it.

example.ex: Several papers carry the photograph of Mr Anderson.
example.tran: 好几份报纸都刊登了安德森先生的照片。

entry.def: In a debate, if a proposal or motion is carried, a majority of people vote in favour of it.

example.ex: A motion backing its economic policy was carried by 322 votes to 296.
example.tran: 一项支持其经济政策的动议以322票对296票通过。

entry.def: If a crime carries a particular punishment, a person who is found guilty of that crime will receive that punishment.

example.ex: It was a crime of espionage and carried the death penalty.
example.tran: 这是间谍罪,应判死刑。

entry.def: If a sound carries, it can be heard a long way away.

example.ex: Even in this stillness Leaphorn doubted if the sound would carry far.
example.tran: 就是在这样的寂静当中,利普霍恩也怀疑声音不会传很远。

entry.tran: (候选人或党派)在(某州或某选区)获胜
entry.def: If a candidate or party carries a state or area, they win the election in that state or area.

example.ex: George W. Bush carried the state with 56 percent of the vote.
example.tran: 乔治·W. 布什在该州以56%的得票率获胜。

entry.def: If you carry yourself in a particular way, you walk and move in that way.

example.ex: They carried themselves with great pride and dignity.
example.tran: 他们举手投足间透着傲气和高贵。

entry.def: If a woman is carrying a child, she is pregnant.

example.ex: There are many theories that claim to be able to predict whether you're carrying a boy or a girl.
example.tran: 有许多理论声称能够预测胎儿的性别。

entry.tran: 急不可待;喜不自胜;忘乎所以
entry.def: If you get carried away or are carried away, you are so eager or excited about something that you do something hasty or foolish.

example.ex: I got completely carried away and almost cried.
example.tran: 我激动不已,几乎哭了出来。

entry.def: If a person or team carries all before them, they succeed very easily.

example.ex: In the formative years their alliance carried all before it.
example.tran: 在草创阶段,他们的联盟所向披靡。

auth_sentence.content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The committee has carried out a survey of practices.

auth_sentence.content: What equipment and services are carried on an ambulance?
auth_sentence.res_content: What equipment and services are carried on an ambulance?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What equipment and services are carried on an ambulance?

auth_sentence.content: The Rangers carried the lead into the third period.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Rangers carried the lead into the third period.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Rangers carried the lead into the third period.

Sentence.sentence: She carried on her family's tradition.

As well as the background checks carried out by platform owners, online reviews and ratings are usually posted by both parties to each transaction, which makes it easy to spot bad drivers, bathrobe-thieves and surfboard-wreckers
Abilene Christian settled on the devices after surveying students and finding that they did not like hauling around their laptops, but that most of them always carried a cell phone, Dr. Dickson said.
It carried passengers leaving an island.
